rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: A spacious, minimalist entrance area with natural light and a subtle Vastu-compliant placement to welcome positive energy. It includes seating and a small decorative element.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An open-plan living room that doubles as dining space, designed in minimalist style with floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light while adhering to Vastu principles of direction alignment.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A sleek, modern kitchen with integrated storage and efficient workflow layout. Its placement is in the south-east as per Vastu norms for prosperity and fire energy.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with minimalist decor ensuring a serene sleeping environment; located in the north-west according to Vastu for relaxation.

rooms.name: Guest Room
rooms.description: Cozy guest room that complements the overall design, maintaining minimalistic aesthetics and placed strategically for privacy.

rooms.name: Balcony/Veranda
rooms.description: A small outdoor space offering natural views and fresh air. Designed to enhance relaxation while aligning with Vastu guidelines by its placement near the living area.

openings.description: Large entry door designed for easy access, incorporating minimalist design and natural lighting to maintain a welcoming ambience.
Floor-to-ceiling windows in the living room and kitchen areas that provide ample natural light and ventilation while respecting Vastu principles of direction.
A modern automated door facilitating access to the two-car garage, designed with sleek lines and integrated into the overall minimalist design.
